department.en: PhD in Institute of Translational and Interdisciplinary Medicine
department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班

goal.en: Machine learning is a part of AI research. It can help participants establish a certain degree of mathematical statistics and programming ability. From the perspective of feature engineering, this course will demonstrate core mathematical knowledge and statistical methods. We use python language to practice statistical techniques and practical examples. Thus students can easily understand the main ideas and details of representative algorithms in feature engineering. In addition to further research and analysis of various data structures (such as physiological signals, biomedical images, and electronic signals) and AI methods, feature engineering techniques can also be extended and applied to translational medicine and expert systems.
goal.ch: 機械學習為人工智慧理論研究的一部分，而一定程度的數理統計以及程式撰寫能力方可奠定研究基礎。從特徵工程的角度出發，本課程將於課堂上演繹核心的數學知識與統計方法，並利用python語言演練相關統計技術與實際範例，使學生易於理解特徵工程中具代表性算法的核心思想與詳細理論內容。除了可以進一步研究分析各類大數據資料結構(如生理訊號、生醫影像、電子訊號等)以及人工智慧方法，更可從而將特徵工程技法延伸運用在轉譯醫學與專家系統等領域之中。

content.en:
Week 1：What is machine learning
Week 2~3：How to deal with your data
Week 4~5：some skills to the text data
Week 6~8：feature scaling
Week 9：Midterm oral presentation
Week 10~11：clustering
Week 12~13：PCA
Week 14~15：K-means
Week 16~17：automatic feature extractor
Week 18：final oral presentation
content.ch:
Week 1：機械學習學甚麼
Week 2~3：處理數據的簡單技術
Week 4~5：文本資料的平展、過濾以及切塊
Week 6~8：特徵縮放的影響
Week 9：期中報告
Week 10~11：變量分類與範例
Week 12~13：使用PCA的降維方法
Week 14~15：使用K-means模型堆疊進行非線性特徵化
Week 16~17：特徵擷取器的自動化
Week 18：期末報告

textbook.en: 1. A First Course to Machine Learning, by S. Rogers & M. Girolami; ISBN: 9781439824146 2. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning, by Christopher M. Bishop; ISBN: 978-0-387-31073-2
textbook.ch: 1. A First Course to Machine Learning, by S. Rogers & M. Girolami; ISBN: 9781439824146 2. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning, by Christopher M. Bishop; ISBN: 978-0-387-31073-2
